title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the constitutional process necessary for Loretta Lynch to be confirmed after being nominated.

For Task A2, the response must explain how this process demonstrates the concept of checks and balances.

For Task B, the response must explain why the power being used in this scenario is given to the president.

For Task C1, the response must describe how the qualifications of Loretta Lynch mentioned in the scenario match the role for which she has been nominated.

For Task C2, the response must explain how she could influence the executive branch in her role.
